komiza.name: Ice Shard
komiza.description: Conjures a small shard of ice and hurls it at the target
komiza.cast_message: {caster} conjures a razor-sharp shard of ice and hurls it at {target}!
komiza.hit_message: The ice shard pierces through for {damage} cold damage!

toduza.name: Fire Bolt
toduza.description: Unleashes a small bolt of flame that ignites the target
toduza.cast_message: {caster} unleashes a bolt of flame at {target}!

komizuma.name: Cone of Cold
komizuma.description: Creates a shower of ice shards that rain down on the target
komizuma.cast_message: {caster} creates a shower of ice shards that rain down on {target}!
komizuma.hit_message: The ice shards slash through for {damage} cold damage!

toduzuma.name: Flame Strike
toduzuma.description: Releases a shower of flame that engulfs the target
toduzuma.cast_message: {caster} releases a shower of flame that engulfs {target}!
toduzuma.hit_message: Flames cascade down, burning for {damage} fire damage!

komidaku.name: Ice Storm
komidaku.description: Summons a storm of ice shards that freezes all enemies
komidaku.cast_message: {caster} summons a freezing storm of ice shards!
komidaku.hit_message: Ice shards shred through all enemies for {damage} cold damage!

komizadaku.name: Blizzard
komizadaku.description: Creates an intense storm of ice shards that freezes all foes
komizadaku.hit_message: The ice storm batters all enemies for {damage} cold damage!

todudaku.name: Firestorm
todudaku.description: Unleashes a devastating firestorm that incinerates all enemies
todudaku.hit_message: The firestorm incinerates everything for {damage} fire damage!

todukar.name: Fireball
todukar.description: Hurls a searing ball of flame at the target
todukar.cast_message: {caster} hurls a searing ball of flame at {target}!
todukar.hit_message: The fireball explodes on impact for {damage} fire damage!

komasidaku.name: Elemental Chaos
komasidaku.description: Creates a chaotic storm of fire bolts and ice shards that ravages all enemies
komasidaku.cast_message: {caster} creates a chaotic storm of fire and ice!
komasidaku.hit_message: Fire and ice tear through all foes for {damage} cold damage!

dumoti.name: Meteor Swarm
dumoti.description: Conjures a devastating maelstrom of searing flame clouds and huge ice shards
dumoti.cast_message: {caster} conjures a devastating maelstrom of fire and ice!
dumoti.hit_message: The elemental maelstrom annihilates all enemies for {damage} cold damage!
